jchess.common.gui

Interface IView

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IBoardView, IClockView, IDialogView, IGameView, IMoveHistoryView, INewGameView, INewLocalGameView, IPanelView, IPawnPromotionDialogView, IPlayerDetailsEntryView, IPlayerView
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BoardView, ClockView, GameView, MoveHistoryView, NewGameView, NewLocalGameView, PawnPromotionDialogView, PlayerDetailsEntryView, PlayerView

    public interface IView
    This interfaces exposes some generic and important methods that all the views should implement.
    Since:
    12 Dec 2019
    Author:
    Sajad Karim
